tool_description: An api that provides climate-change related news from all around the world
name: My Climate Change
title: My Climate Change

api_list.name: Get News from a Specific Source
api_list.description: Returns the news related to climate change from a specified newspaper source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-climate-change1.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-climate-change1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://my-climate-change1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-climate-change1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
